name: Havoc (itch) (Makker, DJblom, jarik2498, milanbakker)
description:
You'll play as an sorcerer protecting his tower. Use different ingredient's to cast spells and fend of myriad of foes. 

Cast spells using three different types of runes as material. These runes are Fire, Ice and Electricity. 

Combine these elements with a spell book to cast spells for greater effect!
